snippet: The men’s and women’s basketball teams are again avoiding the athletes’ village at the Olympics for security reasons, although other high-profile athletes do not share the concern....
abstract: United States Olympic basketball team has rejected lodging in athletes' village in favor of staying on  luxury ship docked at pier on other side of Rio de Janeiro; USA Basketball, organization that oversees national men's and women's teams, has shunned village since 1992, arguing athletes would be harassed due to their high profile.
lead_paragraph: The men’s and women’s basketball teams are again avoiding the athletes’ village at the Olympics for security reasons, although other high-profile athletes do not share the concern.

headline.main: U.S.A. Basketball Is Already Cruising in Rio. Now, to Take the Court.
headline.print_headline: U.S.A. Basketball Is Cruising in Rio. Now, to Take the Court.
